item.title: Karnataka Cooperators push for stronger rural Co-ops at Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[A strong call to strengthen and expand the cooperative movement in rural India marked the celebration of the 72nd All India Cooperative Week at the Raichur Agriculture University Auditorium on Saturday. The day’s focus on “Tribhuvan Sahakari University Research and Training Transforming Cooperative Education” set a forward-looking tone for the gathering.
The event, organised by the Karnataka State Souharda Federal Cooperative Ltd. (KSSFCL) in collaboration with the Karnataka State Cooperative F...]]>
item.author: Amit Awana
